title: Capacitance - charge on capacitor in circuit

content.description: A circuit consists of two resistors of resistances <math alttext="2 ohms" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math> and <math alttext="4 ohms" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Ω</mi></math>, a capacitor of capacitance <math alttext="3 microfarads" overflow="scroll"> <mn>3</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mi>μF</mi> </math>, and a battery with potential difference <math alttext="12 volts" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi></math>, as shown. The circuit has been connected for a long time.
content.question: What is the charge on the positive plate of the capacitor?
